item.title: Page d’exemple
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Voici un exemple de page. Elle est diffrente d'un article de blog, en cela qu'elle restera la mme place, et s'affichera dans le menu de navigation de votre site (en fonction de votre thme). La plupart des gens commencent par crire une page «  Propos » qui les prsente aux visiteurs potentiels du site. Vous pourriez y crire quelque chose de ce tenant :
Bonjour ! Je suis un mcanicien qui aspire devenir un acteur, et ceci est mon blog. J'habite Bordeaux, j'ai un super chien baptis Russell, et j'aime la vodka-ananas (ainsi que perdre mon temps regarder la pluie tomber).
...ou bien quelque chose comme a :
La socit 123 Machin Truc a t cre en 1971, et n'a cess de proposer au public des machins-trucs de qualit depuis cette anne. Situe Saint-Remy-en-Bouzemont-Saint-Genest-et-Isson, 123 Machin Truc emploie 2 000 personnes, et fabrique toutes sortes de bidules super pour la communaut bouzemontoise.
Etant donn que vous tes un nouvel utilisateur de WordPress, vous devriez vous rendre sur votre tableau de bord pour effacer la prsente page, et crer de nouvelles pages avec votre propre contenu. Amusez-vous bien !

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: AMPE Mathilde Genouilly 42190 CHANDON Date of birth 28/12/1991 Driving license Mobile : 06.29.40.02.03 mathilde.ampe@gmail.com www.mathilde-ampe.com   INTERSHIPS AND CONTACTS WITH COMPANIES July 2011 : Sacr Coeur private high school, Paray-le-Monial, web development April 2011 - June 2011 : Museum of Modern Art of Saint-tienne, creation of a family book and of communication documents. September 2010 : Town hall of Le Puy en Velay, creation of posters and flyers for a student day July 2010 : Sacr Coeur private high school, Paray-le-Monial, help accountant June 2010 : Jeanne dArc Private high school, Paray-le-Monial, creation of web site like cdi.ecparay.fr November 2009 - May 2010 : Transmission Express, creation of a web site and replacement of the visual identity for a school project   FORMATIONS At the moment in third year in digital design at ISD,Valenciennes (France) 2011 : DUT SRC (Services and Networks of Communication) in Le Puy en Velay (France) 2009 : Bac S with option Sciences of the Ingenior , lyce Jrmie de la Rue, Charlieu(France)   PERSONAL ACTIVITIES AND HOBBIES Cultural activities : piano and drawing Sports : swimming, badminton et downhill ski I enjoy new technologies and discover it by myself I love travel   SPECIFIC SKILLS Softwares : Maya, Alias, 3ds max, Catia, Photoshop, Illustrator, Indesign, Flash, After Effect, Premire, Showcase, Keyshot Web development : HTML, CSS, PHP, My SQL, Wordpress Languages : French native, English (speak and write), German (speak and write)

item.title: Street lamp
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: rebel by storm
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The watch rebel by storm is the first one I modeled. I choose this one because I really likethe design of their watches, how they lead people to read the hour a different way. And of course, because I prefer it. It was apersonal project and it allows me to learn more about the surface modeling. So the modeling was made with Alias, the rendering and the animation with maya mental ray and the post-production with After Effect and Premiere.

item.title: Livret de Famille
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: To conclued my studies in Services and Networks of Communication, I made a student intership in graphic design to the Museum of Modern Art of Saint-tienne, France. During this time, I made a lot of documents : some flyers, some posters for example and my most important project was to realize a book of activities for children, named "Livret de Famille" I worked with a team of mediators to design this book to children between 4 and 8 years. It was targeted on only one exhibition, "Catalogue" and it had for goal to explain some pieces to children. The most important of my work was to create an attractive cover and illustrate the exhibition. Then I made the layout of the different activities.   You can see the cover and 2 activities.

item.title: Monaco 24
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: This is a project for the school. We have to model the watch Monaco 24 by tag heuer and propose a new strap in metal. This one have to be inspired of the brand Gulf. My own is inspired of Gulf ' visual identity. It's always a work in progress. I will present some other pictures of it and show my strap.   Modeling : about 50h, with Alias Rendering : with Maya Mental ray

item.title: Citron Kholari
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The citron Kholari was my first important project with a team of designers at school.The team was composed of 4 transportation designers and 2 digital designers. Our goal was to create the new citron. We had to do a soft-roader with the peace of mind of the Mehari. It was a 5 mounth project composed of three parts : analysis, conception and development. Finaly we made a concept car of a commercial vehicle.   The animation present the concept. It was made by Sylvain Trannoy, the second digital designer which worked with me on the project. He is at the moment in fifth year.   In this project, my main part was to model the kits : a cool bag, a cloth, something to keep boards and a binder. Those objects was model with maya in polygonal. I although model a rim.

item.title: Nokia C3
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: It's the first object I modeled in surface with Alias. It took me about 40h.
